info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 April 2024,  路 Stayed a few nights
Rating, 3 stars,  路 March 2023,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment:
This is more like a hotel using the airbnb platform. It's safe, secured but had room for improvement. The blanket had stains and the corner of the bed had dirt. The ac wasn't working properly. The place needs better maintenance.
You can order room service but the price is way too high.
They don't accept card payments for ordering room service. Only cash and Bkash.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  路 February 2023,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: For what its worth it was a decent stay, what I will say is if they could include the price of using the swimming pool & gym in the booking fee instead of charging separately for using them. Apart from that it was a good experience. Will definitely use in the future.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  路 January 2023,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment: Place was good. Keya is very responsive. But they should increase the quality of service. Rather than that its a very convenient place to stay.

rating_comment: Peaceful & quiet place. easy access & appropriate kitchen appliance.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  路 October 2022,  路 Stayed one night
Rating, 5 stars,  路 August 2022,  路 Stayed about a week
Rating, 5 stars,  路 August 2022,  路 Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Booked the apartment for my parents. they were quite comfort there. host kept in touch with me and was active with answering questions. over all a good experience of dealing with a host remotely.

info: Rating, 1 star,  路 August 2022,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
It an worst and terrific experience, better dont prefer this place, the host is not taking care of the place and left with a team who doesnt maintain it well, the room was full of spider web, dirty curtains , foul smell, used bedspread and pillow covers, cockroaches, yaak its an terrible experience to stay there, its so tiny place.
Either the host or Airbnb never responded for my refund request, I have booked for 5 nights but stayed only for a night that too awake all night and checkout in the morning and ran away for the site even after proper photos and repeated photos they dont respond
Plz dont waste your money or fall in trap of this photos

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 January 2022,  路 Stayed a few nights
Rating, 4 stars,  路 December 2021,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment:
Affordable, nice studios nearby airport, Jamuna Future Park and Gulshan.
Maati studio apartment gives most facilities to stay in lovely and busy Dhaka city.
Staff is helpful.
Recommended.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  路 November 2021,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
1) Room and bathroom was extremely clean immediately following check-in however room was cleaned and rubbish removed only once during my 6 night stay and this was only due to insistence.
2) Lots of noisy building work being carried out around/on top of the building. The noise was almost unbearable during the day but stopped during the evening.
3) Staff were friendly and helpful.
4) If you want easy access to the south side of Dhaka this is not a good place to stay. it's very very convenient for airport and Gulshan 1&2.
5) TV is good once you understand how to use it.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  路 October 2021,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment: They tried best to serve better

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 December 2020,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment: Good and secure place. The communication was good from the host. There is a lot of construction going on so there was noise during the day but at night it was quiet enough. The place was a bit dusty at first but the cleaner arrived soon and cleaned it up. Would recommend.
